scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run output:watch" "npm run playground:watch:dev" "npm run playground:start" "npm run bench:watch" "npm run bench:start"
scripts.playground:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cd playground && npm run build
scripts.playground:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cd playground && npm run watch
scripts.playground:build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cd playground && npm run build
scripts.playground:watch:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cd playground && npm run watch
scripts.bench:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cd bench && npm run build
scripts.bench:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cd bench && npm run watch
scripts.bench:build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cd bench && npm run build
scripts.bench:watch:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cd bench && npm run watch
